history.text: Hi
Hello, We just saw Monsters University, it was great.
Let's chat!
Nice to know that you've watched Monsters University.
I highly recommend it, it has a Rotten Tomatoes score of 6.8/10.
Unfortunately, I haven't watched that movie.
Billy Crystal plays the voice of Mike, one of the main characters (monsters).
Is he your favorite character in that movie?
I also like John Goodman as the voice of Sulley, he does a good job.
Who is the director of this movie?
It is directed Dan Scanlon.
What year does this movie released?
The movie was released in 2013.
What is the genre of this movie?
It is an animated comedy, produced by Pixar Animation Studios.
Great! Looks like you know a lot about this movie.
The premise is great. The monster Mike, wants to become a scarier monster, so the movie is about how he tries to scare more kids than the other monsters.
Really interesting! Who are the characters in this movie?

Like I said, Mike is one of the main characters that partners with the other monster, Sulley, in a contest against the other monster teams to try to become the scariest monsters. They enter childrens' rooms at night and scare them. They get energy by the children's screams.

When was 
the last time you watched this movie?
Just recently, you should really check it out. One of the other monster teams was disqualified and the movie goes through the monsters' stories as they are in the contest.
Is that your favorite part of the movie?
One of my favorite scenes is when Mike learns that the only reason he won is because Sulley tampered with the machine's difficulty level by making it the easiest setting.
Oh reall? Looks like you enjoyed watching this movie. Who is the producer of this movie?
It is produced by Pixar Animation Studios for Walt Disney Pictures. It is sad when Mike and Sulley are expelled and led away by the CDA for tampering with the machine.
Do you agree with the 79% ratings of Rotten Tomatoes in this movie?
I like the review that says, "is cute, and funny, and the animation, though not exactly inspired, is certainly colorful". I agree with that, it is a safe movie for families.
Great! Who is the MAIN character in this movie? Who is the voice talent or dubber of that character?
Mike and Sulley are main characters. Mike leaves on the bus and Sulley runs after him to try to raise his spirits.
Great! Thanks for a nice conversation
